description:
The IOTA Smart City will be divided into 5 Zones: Tangle, IOTA, Firefly, Shimmer and Assembly the first OG Collection consists of 5 Quarters, ONE quarter from each zone in total 980 Blocks. The Blocks/Lands are 70x70 m = 4900 m2 and have 196 Units.

Every Block/Land is unique and have a Number. When you buy a land you get also:

*196 $ISC Token airdrop

*3D Building-Set airdrop

*one of 980 Minister ISC Ministry DAO (each Zone 196 Minister)

*join the ISC Metaverse World.

7.50 % distribute tokens to the Lands holders. You can manage the facility through the website and be part of IOTA Smart City Ministry DAO launches on website .

You will get 20% off with Discount Award and 100% off with Giveaway Award on Twitter
name: IOTA Smart City pre-sale OG Collection
